text: Manuhe tomaka prasna karae, sihamtara babe ki ki halala karaa haiche? Koraa, ‘tomalokara babe sakalo dharanara paraitra bastu halala karaa haiche, arau cikarai jantu yiboraka tomaloke cikara prasiksana dicha arau yiboraka tomaloke se'i siksa diya yito allahe tomalokaka sika'iche. Eteke enekuraa janturae tomalokara babe yi dharai ane seya tomaloke khoraa, arasye tara oparata allahara nama la’ba arau allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa. Niscaya allaha ati drauta hicapa grahanakarai
